markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, there are these four floods. What four? The floods of sensuality, desire to be reborn, views, and ignorance.” (To be expanded as in SN 45.171–179.)

SN.46.131–142. Punagaṅgānadīādisutta (“More on the Ganges River, Etc.“)
